verses.verse: וְזֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> now this הַדָּבָ֜ר <S%H1697><s%> And this [is] the thing אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that thou shalt do לָהֶ֛ם לְקַדֵּ֥שׁ <S%H6942><s%> unto them to hallow אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לְכַהֵ֣ן <S%H3547><s%> them to minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י לְ֠קַח <S%H3947><s%> Take פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock אֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> one בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> young בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> bull וְאֵילִ֥ם <S%H352><s%> rams שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish

וְלֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread מַצּ֗וֹת <S%H4682><s%> And unleavened וְחַלֹּ֤ת <S%H2471><s%> and cakes מַצֹּת֙ <S%H4682><s%> unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1101><s%> tempered בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <S%H7550><s%> and wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <S%H4886><s%> anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil סֹ֥לֶת <S%H5560><s%> flour חִטִּ֖ים <S%H2406><s%> [of] wheaten תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְנָתַתָּ֤ <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and סַ֣ל <S%H5536><s%> basket אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> them into one וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <S%H7126><s%> and bring אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּסָּ֑ל <S%H5536><s%> them in the basket וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> with the bullock וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> and the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <S%H352><s%> rams

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons תַּקְרִ֔יב <S%H7126><s%> thou shalt bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <S%H7364><s%> and shalt wash אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> them with water

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּגָדִ֗ים <S%H899><s%> the garments וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֤ <S%H3847><s%> and put אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> upon Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֻּתֹּ֔נֶת <S%H3801><s%> the coat וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> מְעִ֣יל <S%H4598><s%> and the robe הָאֵפֹ֔ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> and the ephod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> and the breastplate וְאָפַדְתָּ֣ <S%H640><s%> and gird ל֔וֹ בְּחֵ֖שֶׁב <S%H2805><s%> him with the curious girdle הָאֵפֹֽד׃ <S%H646><s%> of the ephod

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> And thou shalt put הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת <S%H4701><s%> the mitre עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וְנָתַתָּ֛ <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֵ֥זֶר <S%H5145><s%> crown הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּצְנָֽפֶת׃ <S%H4701><s%> upon the mitre

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> Then shalt thou take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> the anointing וְיָצַקְתָּ֖ <S%H3332><s%> and pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> [it] upon his head וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֖ <S%H4886><s%> and anoint אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֖ם <S%H3847><s%> and put כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <S%H3801><s%> coats

וְחָגַרְתָּ֩ <S%H2296><s%> And thou shalt gird אֹתָ֨ם <S%H853><s%> אַבְנֵ֜ט <S%H73><s%> them with girdles אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּבָנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וְחָבַשְׁתָּ֤ <S%H2280><s%> and put לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like מִגְבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H4021><s%> the bonnets וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּהֻנָּ֖ה <S%H3550><s%> on them and the priest's office לְחֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> statute עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> shall be theirs for a perpetual וּמִלֵּאתָ֥ <S%H4390><s%> accomplish יַֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> able אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> able בָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> to be brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> And thou shalt cause a bullock לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְסָמַ֨ךְ <S%H5564><s%> shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הַפָּֽר׃ <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֥ <S%H7819><s%> And thou shalt kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [by] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנֹ֥ת <S%H7161><s%> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar בְּאֶצְבָּעֶ֑ךָ <S%H676><s%> with thy finger וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> all the blood תִּשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> and pour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> beside יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֗ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַחֵלֶב֮ <S%H2459><s%> all the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> that covereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֶּרֶב֒ <S%H7130><s%> the inwards וְאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3508><s%> and the caul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> [that is] above the liver וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that עֲלֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H5921><s%> is on וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֖ <S%H6999><s%> that [is] upon them and burn הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> [them] upon the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> But the flesh הַפָּר֙ <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹר֣וֹ <S%H5785><s%> and his skin וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6569><s%> and his dung תִּשְׂרֹ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> shalt thou burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> ram הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one תִּקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> Thou shalt also take וְסָ֨מְכ֜וּ <S%H5564><s%> shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> of the ram

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֖ <S%H7819><s%> And thou shalt slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> and thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמ֔וֹ <S%H1818><s%> his blood וְזָרַקְתָּ֥ <S%H2236><s%> and sprinkle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> [it] round about

וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram תְּנַתֵּ֖חַ <S%H5408><s%> And thou shalt cut לִנְתָחָ֑יו <S%H5409><s%> in pieces וְרָחַצְתָּ֤ <S%H7364><s%> and wash קִרְבּוֹ֙ <S%H7130><s%> the inwards וּכְרָעָ֔יו <S%H3767><s%> of him and his legs וְנָתַתָּ֥ <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נְתָחָ֖יו <S%H5409><s%> [them] unto his pieces וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and its רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> and unto his head

וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֤ <S%H6999><s%> And thou shalt burn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> the whole ram הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar עֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> it [is] a burnt offering ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיח֔וֹחַ <S%H5207><s%> it [is] a sweet אִשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> you

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ram הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> the other וְסָמַ֨ךְ <S%H5564><s%> shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> of the ram

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֣ <S%H7819><s%> Then shalt thou kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֗יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <S%H3947><s%> and take מִדָּמוֹ֙ <S%H1818><s%> of his blood וְנָֽתַתָּ֡ה <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on תְּנוּךְ֩ <S%H8571><s%> [it] upon the tip אֹ֨זֶן <S%H241><s%> of the right ear אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on תְּנ֨וּךְ <S%H8571><s%> and upon the tip אֹ֤זֶן <S%H241><s%> ear בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> of his sons הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of the right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the thumb יָדָם֙ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of their right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the great toe רַגְלָ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> foot הַיְמָנִ֑ית <S%H3233><s%> of their right וְזָרַקְתָּ֧ <S%H2236><s%> and sprinkle אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַדָּ֨ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַמִּזְבֵּחַ֮ <S%H4196><s%> that [is] upon the altar וּמִשֶּׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָה֒ <S%H4888><s%> and of the anointing וְהִזֵּיתָ֤ <S%H5137><s%> and sprinkle עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> [it] upon Aaron וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> and upon his garments וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בָּנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and upon his sons וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> and upon the garments בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְקָדַ֥שׁ <S%H6942><s%> with him and he shall be hallowed הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וּבְגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> and his garments וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וּבִגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> garments בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וְעִשָּׂרֹ֨ן <S%H6241><s%> a tenth סֹ֜לֶת <S%H5560><s%> deal of flour בָּל֨וּל <S%H1101><s%> mingled בְּשֶׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil כָּתִית֙ <S%H3795><s%> of beaten רֶ֣בַע <S%H7253><s%> with the fourth part הַהִ֔ין <S%H1969><s%> of an hin וְנֵ֕סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> [for] a drink offering רְבִעִ֥ית <S%H7253><s%> one-fourth הַהִ֖ין <S%H1969><s%> of an hin יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lamb הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> And with the one

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֣בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lamb הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> And the other תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt offer בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> at הָעַרְבָּ֑יִם <S%H6153><s%> at even כְּמִנְחַ֨ת <S%H4503><s%> thereto according to the meat offering הַבֹּ֤קֶר <S%H1242><s%> of the morning וּכְנִסְכָּהּ֙ <S%H5262><s%> and according to the drink offering תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and shalt do לָּ֔הּ לְרֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> thereof for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

עֹלַ֤ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering תָּמִיד֙ <S%H8548><s%> [This shall be] a continual לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> throughout your generations פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> I אִוָּעֵ֤ד <S%H3259><s%> where I will meet לָכֶם֙ שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there לְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> you to speak אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְנֹעַדְתִּ֥י <S%H3259><s%> And there I will meet שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנִקְדַּ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> and [the tabernacle] shall be sanctified בִּכְבֹדִֽי׃ <S%H3519><s%> by my glory

וְקִדַּשְׁתִּ֛י <S%H6942><s%> And I will sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> and the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> also both Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֲקַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> I will sanctify לְכַהֵ֥ן <S%H3547><s%> to minister to me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְשָׁ֣כַנְתִּ֔י <S%H7931><s%> And I will dwell בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> and will be their God

וְיָדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> And they shall know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצֵ֧אתִי <S%H3318><s%> that brought them forth אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְשָׁכְנִ֣י <S%H7931><s%> that I may dwell בְתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> them I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God פ
